fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Plunder: Gain a non-Special card of your choice every Night phase. [Activates D3] 
- Loot: Whenever you Kill someone, take all of the cards they did not use.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pillage: Pick a player. If they havenâ€™t played any cards this phase, steal 2 cards from them. [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique]
- Threaten: When in a trade, take all cards from the opposing player immediately. [1 use, Unique]
- Intimidate: Select 4 or less players. They will not draw at the end of the phase. [1 use, Unique, Locks D5]
